title: How to Make Peanut Butter Smartie Cookies

steps.headline: Spray a baking sheet with cooking spray.
Mix the flour and baking soda together well in a bowl.
Combine the peanut butter, butter, brown sugar, and sugar in another large bowl.
steps.description: You can also use a mixer for convenience. Mix until it's smooth.

steps.headline: Dump the egg and vanilla in.
Mix the flour mix together with the peanut butter mix.
Dump all of the smarties in.
steps.description: Fold in until it's all evenly put.

steps.headline: Place the batter onto the prepared cookie sheet.

text: Spray a baking sheet with cooking spray.  Preheat oven to 350 degrees Fahrenheit.  Mix the flour and baking soda together well in a bowl.  Combine the peanut butter, butter, brown sugar, and sugar in another large bowl. You can also use a mixer for convenience. Mix until it's smooth. Dump the egg and vanilla in. Continue mixing. Mix the flour mix together with the peanut butter mix.  Dump all of the smarties in. Fold in until it's all evenly put. Place the batter onto the prepared cookie sheet.  Cook for 12-15 minutes.  Allow to cool and enjoy!
